flawed_nl_solution:
She has mowed 90 square feet because 3 x 20 x 15 = <<3*20*15=90>>90
She has earned $9 because 90 x 0.1 = <<90*0.1=9>>9
She has to earn $141 more dollars because 150 - 9 = <<150-9=141>>141
She has to mow 1410 more square feet of lawns because 141 / 0.1 = <<141/0.1=1410>>1410
#### 1410

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 900, not 90. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
